project.description: This job will find accuracy of the model and based on accuracy it will mail to developer regarding success or failure of the model

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: if sudo cat /root/MLOps/Python/main.py | grep keras then accuracy=$(sudo docker exec neuralnetwork python /home/accuracytest.py) else accuracy=$(sudo docker exec sklearn python /home/accuracytest.py) fi if (( $accuracy >= 80 )) then sudo python3 /root/MLOps/Python/success.py exit 1 else sudo python3 /root/MLOps/Python/fail.py fi
